747720.name: NASCAR Heat 2 - November Value Pack
747720.description:
Enjoy a total of 13 new paint schemes, including some from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series and NASCAR XFINITY Series. This pack features schemes of drivers like Chase Elliott, Dale Earnhardt, Jr., Justin Allgaier, and Daniel Hemric.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Chase Elliott #24 NAPA Brakes Chevrolet (Richmond)
Dale Earnhardt Jr. #88 Axalta Chevrolet (Sonoma)
Kasey Kahne #5 AARP Drive to End Hunger Chevrolet (Richmond)
…

NXS:
Justin Allgaier #7 Cessna / Beechcraft Chevrolet (Dover)
Bubba Wallace #6 GlobeLife Ford (Talladega)

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!
747720.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
